#summary How to compile Oricutron for AmigaOS 4.x
#labels Compiling

= Introduction =

This page describes how to compile Oricutron for AmigaOS 4.x

  * Download and install the [http://hyperion-entertainment.biz/index.php?option=com_registration&view=files&parent=30&Itemid=63 latest AmigaOS 4.x SDK]
  * Download and install the [http://code.google.com/p/os4sdl/ latest SDL for OS4 SDK]
  * If you want to check out the source with subversion, grab the latest subversion package from [http://www.os4depot.net OS4depot] (search for 'subversion').
  * Either download and extract a source package from the [https://bintray.com/pete/generic/Oricutron download page], or [http://code.google.com/p/oriculator/source/checkout check out] the current subversion trunk.
  * Open a shell, and navigate to the Oricutron sourcecode
  * Type "gmake".

Hopefully, an Oricutron executable should come out the other end.
